overview: "A short film I made for my niece Alana, on her 4th birthday. It was filmed at Chapeltown Carnival in Leeds, set to ‘Amor en Jacumã’ by Brazilian musician Lucas Santtana. It was entirely edited in camera – all the double and triple exposures were done using my Nikon R10 camera. I hand-processed the film too." — M.J.
title: Alana and the Carnival
